name: The Munchies
description:
The icons on the right side unfortunately hide how many treat points you have! You can see it much clearer in the downloadable version.

*NB make sure you hit the enter key before clicking off of the game at all. It won't go past the intro if you've clicked off of it! If that doesn't work, there is a downloadable link as well!*

Welcome to The Munchies! The goal of this game is to collect as many munchies as you can in order to increase your munchie-loving abilities. Increase both your skills as well as your pets as you are stronger together when it comes to enjoying munchies.

The downloadable file has a save/load system if you want to continue on with your progress.

Prestige features coming soon!
